name: Hecate
god: Goddess of boundaries, crossroads, witchcraft, the Moon, necromancy, and ghosts
symbol: Paired torches, dogs, serpents, keys, daggers, and Hecate's wheel is known as a stropholos.
sibling: Aeacus, Angelos (Greek mythology)|Angelos, Aphrodite, Apollo, Ares, Artemis, Athena, Eileithyia, Enyo, Eris (mythology)|Eris, Ersa, Hebe (mythology)|Hebe, Helen of Troy, Hephaestus, Hermes, Minos, Pandia, Persephone, Perseus, Rhadamanthus, the Graces, the Horae, the Litae, the Muses, the Moirai
children: Alexiares and Anicetus, Telephus, Hyllus, Tlepolemus
